request.positivePrompt: Scene: Thorny hill near the dark pond, tense exchange between characters. Action: Guardian sitting defensive among bristling thorns; Alexander offering the glowing stone; Adrian speaking gently; Emma perched on a thorn, stirring red sparks. Lighting: localized warm glow from the stone contrasted with cool shadow of thorns; dappled backlight creates rim light around characters. Camera perspective: slight high-angle to capture thorn maze and characters' faces. Environment specifics: pungent scent suggestions visualized as textured swirls (resinous and metallic), needles embedded in moss, recurring motifs: glowing stone and whispered melody. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly.
